item.title: Samsung Clears Out Galaxy Tab A9+ at All-Time Low, Now the Budget Tablet Alternative to Apple iPad
item.content:encoded:
There are tons of tablets on the market, but only a handful of great ones that you’ll want to bring home immediately. We’ve found one in particular that’s a great candidate to add to your arsenal: the Samsung Galaxy Tab A9+.

If you’d rather get one without having to pay full price, you can do that right now by buying at Amazon. There, it’s just $139.99 instead of its normal retail price of $220.00. That’s a savings of $80.01 and a discount of approximately 36%.

See at Amazon

A workhorse of a tablet perfect for your everyday needs

When you’re in a situation where you don’t want to get a new laptop, but you still need something that can perform, this is the type of tablet you should seek out. And what’s more, it can do just about anything you may need it to do.

This tablet has a fantastic, crisp screen with vivid colors that wraps around the edges of the tablet. It makes everything look a little brighter and better, and those small touches really do matter. And speaking of touch, the touchscreen is quick and responsive, so you can navigate through apps and read content without a hitch. The size of the Galaxy Tab A9+ makes it a great candidate for giving you an immersive viewing experience while still being small enough to be held comfortably in one hand or easily stored in a backpack for travel.

As far as the hardware goes, the Galaxy Tab A9+ comes equipped with a processor that performs everyday functions efficiently. Switching back and forth between apps, checking email, browsing Facebook, and streaming movies is easy work for this tablet. Sure, it won’t perform like a high-end laptop, but it will meet your needs when it comes to daily usage and function. It’s running Android, providing access to thousands of apps available through the Google Play Store so you can personalize your new piece of tech with all the apps and games you could want.

The battery life of the Samsung Galaxy Tab A9+ is sufficient to last throughout an entire day of use. Regardless of whether you’re streaming movies, listening to music, or simply reading, you’ll have ample power to get through your day without needing to plug in your charger multiple times.

With its impressive display, excellent performance, and all-day battery life, the Samsung Galaxy Tab A9+ is an ideal companion for everyday life as a multimedia and productivity tool. Now that it’s on sale for just $139.99 on Amazon (down from $220), it’s a good time to go ahead and lock yours in without having to worry about paying full price.

See at Amazon
